text: This is a list of women writers of Guyana. ==A-M== * Andaiye (1942–2019) * Mahadai Das (b. 1954) * Brenda DoHarris * Beryl Gilroy (1924–2001) * Janet Jagan (1920–2009) * Meiling Jin (b. 1956) * Laxmi Kallicharan (1951–2002) * Oonya Kempadoo (b. 1966) * Karen King-Aribisala * Sharon Maas (b. 1951) * Pauline Melville (b. 1948) ==N-Z== * Grace Nichols (b. 1950) * Elly Niland * Ryhaan Shah * Rajkumari Singh (1923–1979) * Narmala Shewcharan * Jan Shinebourne (b. 1947) * Rajkumari Singh (1923–1979) * Maya Tiwari (b. 1952) Women Guyana Guyanese women writers Writers
title: List of Guyanese women writers
